amendment.description: To exempt from pay-as-you-go enforcement modifications to the individual alternative minimum tax (AMT) that prevent millions of additional taxpayers from having to pay the AMT.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4276 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 78.

action.text: Amendment SA 4276 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR 3/14/2008 S2077-2078; text as modified: CR 3/14/2008 S2077) To exempt from pay-as-you-go enforcement modifications to the individual alternative minimum tax (AMT) that prevent millions of additional taxpayers from having to pay the AMT.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4276 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 78.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4276 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 78.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4276 proposed by Senator Grassley.
